Oxo said:
 

> the place i'm thinking of is called albion woods.  you have to reserve it, and it costs something like $75-$100 for > a weekend day.  it's reserved through the metropark system.

Yeah that's right near where I grew up in Strongsville.   My impression was that you could have an event in the MetroParks with alcohol if you just paid a park ranger to be there - my sister and her husband got married at the music mound in Berea, and had their reception at the Chalet in Strongsville - (where the toboggan chutes are) it just cost to rent the area and have a ranger there to "supervise" - and we had kegs and kegs of beer :)

By the way, just a shout out to the Chalet and toboggan chutes - I went there when I was back in Strongsville a few months ago, and it was great - you should all take advantage of it before it gets warm!  The chutes are just as thrilling as ever!


-K
